attributes.action: Make mandatory life sentence for using a knife to kill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stabbings are an every day occurrance, there are 3 times more people killed every year through the use of a knife than a gun.  Make a deterrent so that if you carry a knife and kill a person, you will receive a mandatory life sentence.  Life for a knife.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make mandatory life sentence for using a knife to kill."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20210


Prime Minister's Office
